name: Click The Sussy 2
description:
Welcome to the new generation of gaming. Click the sussy 2 extends from the predecessor in the series, Click the sussy 1. Click the sussy 2 has much more to offer than Click the sussy 1. For instance, You can now upgrade your clicks and the levels are now infinite! New autoclickers and more! Even more features are coming in future releases!

Want to play the original Click the sussy?
